name: fzbz
description: FizzBuzz (modified) on one million numbers, positive integers

scripts.fzbz:
echo '
fzbz-1.js
---------' > out.txt && node fzbz-1.js >> out.txt && echo '
fzbz-2.js
---------' >> out.txt && node fzbz-2.js >> out.txt && echo '
fzbz-3.js
---------' >> out.txt && node fzbz-3.js >> out.txt && echo '
fzbz-4.js
---------' >> out.txt && node fzbz-4.js >> out.txt && echo '
fzbz-5.js
---------' >> out.txt && node fzbz-5.js >> out.txt && echo '
fzbz-6.js
---------' >> out.txt && node fzbz-6.js >> out.txt

author: FizzBuzz, Fizz, Buzz
